short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to import articles into Vocab directly from your web browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vocab is a tool to turn text into personalized quizzes and improve your English vocabulary.

Use this chrome extension to import articles and e-books directly into Vocab. 

All you have to do is visit the site with your text and click the Vocab icon in your browser.
